languages.text: Запись содержала послание от капитана Новы ван Дейн. На пикте почти ничего было не разобрать — только руку, которой капитан вцепилась в край стола, и переливчатые всполохи света. Капитан говорила отчетливо, почти спокойно... но где-то на самом краю слуха звучали короткие полувздохи — как те, что встречали команду Вольного Торговца при высадке. И кажется даже, что звучали они не на записи, а там, на полутемном мостике, из залитых чернотой углов...

traits.locale_text: Запись содержала послание от капитана Новы ван Дейн. На пикте почти ничего было не разобрать — только руку, которой капитан вцепилась в край стола, и переливчатые всполохи света. Капитан говорила отчетливо, почти спокойно... но где-то на самом краю слуха звучали короткие полувздохи — как те, что встречали команду Вольного Торговца при высадке. И кажется даже, что звучали они не на записи, а там, на полутемном мостике, из залитых чернотой углов...

languages.text: The recording contained a message from Captain Nova van Dayne. It was almost impossible to make anything out in the pict — only the captain's hand gripping the edge of the table, and flashes of iridescent light. The captain was speaking crisply, almost calmly... but there were also short, almost inaudible, breaths — exactly what the Rogue Trader's team had encountered when they had first boarded the ship. And it even seemed that those sounds were coming not from the recording, but from the gloom-drenched corners of the bridge itself...

languages.text: La grabación contenía un mensaje de la capitana Nova van Dayne. Era casi imposible distinguir algo en la imagen: solo se veían la mano de la capitana aferrándose al borde de la mesa y algunos destellos iridiscentes. La capitana hablaba con claridad, casi tranquila... pero también había una respiración casi inaudible. Era exactamente lo mismo que el equipo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente había experimentado al abordar la nave en primer lugar. Es más, parecía que el sonido no venía de la grabación, sino de los rincones más oscuros del puente...
languages.original_text: The recording contained a message from Captain Nova van Dayne. languages.text: 视讯记录中记载着诺娃·冯·戴恩舰长的信息。画面中的一切几乎都无法辨认，只能看到舰长的手抓着桌子边缘，七彩斑斓的光芒不断闪烁。舰长的声音很干脆，甚至可以称得上是平静……但偶尔会传来短促的、几乎听不到的喘息声，这也正是行商浪人的队伍刚刚登船时听到的声音。而且，这些声音似乎并非来自视讯记录，而是来自舰桥本身某个阴暗的角落……
languages.original_text: The recording contained a message from Captain Nova van Dayne. It was almost impossible to make anything out in the pict — only the captain's hand gripping the edge of the table, and flashes of iridescent light. The captain was speaking crisply, almost calmly... but there were also short, almost inaudible, breaths — exactly what the Rogue Trader's team had encountered when they had first boarded the ship. And it even seemed that those sounds were coming not from the recording, but from the gloom-drenched corners of the bridge itself...

traits.locale_text: 视讯记录中记载着诺娃·冯·戴恩舰长的信息。画面中的一切几乎都无法辨认，只能看到舰长的手抓着桌子边缘，七彩斑斓的光芒不断闪烁。舰长的声音很干脆，甚至可以称得上是平静……但偶尔会传来短促的、几乎听不到的喘息声，这也正是行商浪人的队伍刚刚登船时听到的声音。而且，这些声音似乎并非来自视讯记录，而是来自舰桥本身某个阴暗的角落……

languages.text: 映像には、ノヴァ・ヴァン・ダイン船長からのメッセージが入っていた。この映像から何かを理解することは不可能だ。テーブルの端を握る船長の手と、虹色の光によるフラッシュしか分からない。船長は歯切れよく、とても穏やかに話している…しかし、ほとんど聞きとれないような短い呼吸音もあった。まさに、自由開拓者が最初に船に入ったときに遭遇したものだ。そしてその音は映像からではなく、薄暗いブリッジ自体の隅から聞こえているようにさえ感じるのだ…
languages.original_text: The recording contained a message from Captain Nova van Dayne. The captain was speaking crisply, almost calmly... but there were also short, almost inaudible, breaths — exactly what the Rogue Trader's team had encountered when they had first boarded the ship. And it even seemed that those sounds were coming not from the recording, but from the gloom-drenched corners of the bridge itself...

traits.locale_text: 映像には、ノヴァ・ヴァン・ダイン船長からのメッセージが入っていた。この映像から何かを理解することは不可能だ。テーブルの端を握る船長の手と、虹色の光によるフラッシュしか分からない。船長は歯切れよく、とても穏やかに話している…しかし、ほとんど聞きとれないような短い呼吸音もあった。まさに、自由開拓者が最初に船に入ったときに遭遇したものだ。そしてその音は映像からではなく、薄暗いブリッジ自体の隅から聞こえているようにさえ感じるのだ…

languages.text: Die Aufnahme enthielt eine Nachricht von Captain Nova van Dayne. In dem Vid selbst war kaum etwas zu erkennen – nur die Hand des Captains, die sich an die Tischkante klammerte, und schillernde Lichtblitze. Der Captain sprach klar, fast ruhig ... aber es gab auch kurze, fast unhörbare Atemzüge – genau wie jene, denen das Team {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} begegnet war, nachdem es an Bord des Schiffs gegangen war. Und es machte sogar den Eindruck, als kämen diese Geräusche gar nicht aus der Aufnahme, sondern aus den düsteren Ecken der Brücke selbst ...
languages.original_text: The recording contained a message from Captain Nova van Dayne. It was almost impossible to make anything out in the pict — only the captain's hand gripping the edge of the table, and flashes of iridescent light. The captain was speaking crisply, almost calmly... but there were also short, almost inaudible, breaths — exactly what the Rogue Trader's team had encountered when they had first boarded the ship. And it even seemed that those sounds were coming not from the recording, but from the gloom-drenched corners of the bridge itself...

traits.locale_text: Die Aufnahme enthielt eine Nachricht von Captain Nova van Dayne. In dem Vid selbst war kaum etwas zu erkennen – nur die Hand des Captains, die sich an die Tischkante klammerte, und schillernde Lichtblitze. Der Captain sprach klar, fast ruhig ... aber es gab auch kurze, fast unhörbare Atemzüge – genau wie jene, denen das Team {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} begegnet war, nachdem es an Bord des Schiffs gegangen war. Und es machte sogar den Eindruck, als kämen diese Geräusche gar nicht aus der Aufnahme, sondern aus den düsteren Ecken der Brücke selbst ...

languages.text: L'enregistrement contenait un message de la capitaine Nova van Dayne. Il était presque impossible de distinguer quoi que ce soit sur la pictocapture, à part des éclairs de lumière iridescente et la main de van Dayne qui agrippait le bord de la table. Elle parlait d'une voix nette, presque calme... mais on entendait aussi de brefs souffles à peine audibles, identiques à ceux qui avaient semé la panique parmi l'équipe {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} peu après leur arrivée. Il semblait même que ces sons ne venaient pas de l'enregistrement, mais des recoins plongés dans les ténèbres de la passerelle...
languages.original_text: The recording contained a message from Captain Nova van Dayne. It was almost impossible to make anything out in the pict — only the captain's hand gripping the edge of the table, and flashes of iridescent light. The captain was speaking crisply, almost calmly... but there were also short, almost inaudible, breaths — exactly what the Rogue Trader's team had encountered when they had first boarded the ship. And it even seemed that those sounds were coming not from the recording, but from the gloom-drenched corners of the bridge itself...

Il semblait même que ces sons ne venaient pas de l'enregistrement, mais des recoins plongés dans les ténèbres de la passerelle...

languages.text: Kayıt, Kaptan Nova van Dayne'dan bir mesaj barındırıyordu. Fotodan herhangi bir çıkarım yapmak oldukça zordu zira yalnızca kaptanın masayı sımsıkı kavrayan elleri ve yanardöner ışık patlamaları net seçiliyordu. Kaptan, sakince ve tane tane konuşuyordu ancak... Kesik ve belli belirsiz nefesi, gemiye ayak bastıklarında Hür Tacir'in takımının karşılaştığı durumu anımsatıyordu. Öyle ki sesler, kayıttan değil de köprünün karanlık köşelerinden geliyormuş izlenimi uyandırıyordu...
languages.original_text: The recording contained a message from Captain Nova van Dayne. It was almost impossible to make anything out in the pict — only the captain's hand gripping the edge of the table, and flashes of iridescent light. The captain was speaking crisply, almost calmly... but there were also short, almost inaudible, breaths — exactly what the Rogue Trader's team had encountered when they had first boarded the ship. And it even seemed that those sounds were coming not from the recording, but from the gloom-drenched corners of the bridge itself...

traits.locale_text: Kayıt, Kaptan Nova van Dayne'dan bir mesaj barındırıyordu. Fotodan herhangi bir çıkarım yapmak oldukça zordu. Zira yalnızca kaptanın masayı sımsıkı kavrayan elleri ve yanardöner ışık patlamaları net seçiliyordu. Kaptan sakince ve tane tane konuşuyordu ancak… Kesik ve belli belirsiz nefesi, Hür Tacir'in takımının, gemiye ayak bastığında karşılaştığı durumu anımsatıyordu. Öyle ki sesler kayıttan değil, köprünün karanlık köşelerinden geliyor izlenimi uyandırıyordu…
